name: Scratch (enargy)
description:
UPDATE: [1/15/2020] - Someone on the Gameshell forums pointed out that unless we provide binaries, you would need pico-8 to play this on hardware -- OOPS!

So I've uploaded binaries for Windows, Linux, OSX, and Raspberry Pi -- let me know if you have questions!

[1/13/2020] - there was a bug that made it sometimes impossible to collect all 100 cats. this is fixed in the 'hotfix' update

Use X to scratch cats

Grab them up

Drop them off

Use the cash to buy upgrades
